thread.title: Hundreds of Southwest flights delayed by glitch
thread.title_full: Hundreds of Southwest flights delayed by glitch

author: senh
title: Hundreds of Southwest flights delayed by glitch
text: BING NEWS: Tech glitch delays hundreds of Southwest flights Southwest Airlines says hundreds of flights have been delayed by technical issues. About 300 flights had been delayed as of early Sunday afternoon, the Dallas-based airline said. USA TODAY In this Sept. 8, 2014 file photo, a Southwest Airlines plane sits ... 10/12/2015 - 1:34 am | View Link Hundreds of Southwest flights delayed by glitch DALLAS — Hundreds of Southwest Airlines flights were delayed by technical issues that forced it to check in some customers manually at airports and caused long lines on Sunday. The Dallas-based company asked travelers to arrive at least two hours before ... 10/12/2015 - 12:24 am | View Link Online Booking Problems Delay Hundreds Of Southwest Airlines Flights Hundreds of Southwest Airlines flights have been delayed due to technical problems, with the Dallas-based company warning passengers flying on Monday to already print their boarding passes before driving to the airport.
